name: Lantivet and Lansallos walk, Mid and SE Cornwall

ai.summary: A 4.1 km easy coastal ridge walk in Mid and SE Cornwall linking Lantivet and Lansallos. The route offers gentle ascents with exposed sea viewpoints, grassy paths, and occasional rocky stretches, ideal for a relaxed day on the coast with scenic cliff and cove views.
ai.terrain_summary: Coastal path with a mix of grassy ridges, compact trails, and some rocky or uneven sections. Expect occasional narrow sections near cliff edges, with short gentle climbs and sweeping sea panoramas along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Coastal cliffs can be unstable; stay on marked paths and away from edge drops. Weather in Cornwall can change rapidly; bring layers and waterproofs. Wear sturdy footwear for uneven surfaces; check tide times if the route intersects tidal beaches. Carry sufficient water, a charged phone, and a basic first aid kit. Inform someone of your plans and start times.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light boots
Map or offline navigation (GPS) or a charged smartphone
Basic first aid kit (blister care, plasters, antiseptic)
Headlamp or flashlight (for low light conditions)
Phone with emergency contact information and local hiking tips
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (March–October) is ideal; the route can be walked year-round with proper gear and daylight.

seo.title: Lantivet and Lansallos Walk – Easy 4.1 km Coastal Ridge Hike in Cornwall, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Lantivet and Lansallos coastal ridge walk in Cornwall. A 4.1 km easy coastal trail with sea views, cliff paths, and gentle ridges—perfect for a relaxed day along the UK coast.
seo.h1: Lantivet and Lansallos Walk – Easy Coastal Ridge Walk in Cornwall
